personal.name: Antonio Mindov
personal.title: Senior Software Developer & AI Enthusiast
personal.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. - Arthur C. Clarke
personal.tagline: Diving into the gritty details of AI, systems, and emerging tech
personal.bio: Senior developer with a passion for exploring the deepest layers of technology. From blockchain to AI, from 3D rendering to bioinformatics, I thrive on understanding how things really work beneath the surface.

journey.title: TUES High School
journey.subtitle: Systems Programming
journey.description: Where it all began - diving deep into systems programming and laying the foundation for a career in software development.

journey.title: Android Developer
journey.subtitle: First Professional Steps
journey.description: Learned professional development practices, worked directly with clients, and provided innovative solutions.

journey.title: Bachelor's in Informatics
journey.subtitle: Sofia University
journey.description: Advanced computer science education while working professionally, expanding theoretical knowledge alongside practical experience.

journey.title: Software Developer
journey.subtitle: 3D Rendering & Full-Stack
journey.organization: Chaos - Market Leader in 3D Rendering Software
journey.description: Worked on build systems, R&D networking projects, full-stack development with React and GoLang, and led a Python-based project from inception.

journey.title: Senior Blockchain Developer
journey.subtitle: Stabilizing Crypto Infrastructure
journey.description: Stabilized and improved HashPort crypto bridge, ensured codebase quality with testing and CI/CD improvements, and provided crucial support during major incidents.

journey.title: Tech Lead
journey.subtitle: Leading Innovation
journey.description: Oversaw all technical aspects, proactively suggested enhancements, and facilitated integration and mentorship of new team members.

journey.title: Senior Java Developer
journey.subtitle: Plugin Architecture
journey.description: Part of a newly formed team developing plugins for the core system.

journey.title: AI Developer
journey.subtitle: Semantic Caching for AI
journey.description: Working on LangCache, leveraging Redis to provide semantic caching for AI applications, developing innovative solutions to optimize AI model performance.

interests.name: Artificial Intelligence
interests.description: Passionate about AI technologies, semantic caching, and optimizing ML model performance. Currently working on LangCache at Redis.

interests.name: Bioinformatics
interests.description: Recently exploring the intersection of computer science and biology, fascinated by computational approaches to biological problems.

interests.name: 3D Printing
interests.description: Love bringing digital designs into the physical world, experimenting with materials and creating functional objects.

interests.name: Archery
interests.description: Finding focus and precision through traditional archery, where every detail matters.

interests.name: Horse Riding
interests.description: Connecting with nature and developing trust and communication with magnificent animals.

philosophy.title: Deep Dive Mentality
philosophy.content: I believe in going into the grittiest details of everything. Whether it's understanding how a database engine works at the byte level, diving into assembly to optimize performance, or reading research papers to implement cutting-edge AI algorithms - I always emerge more knowledgeable than before. Surface-level understanding is never enough.
